mapper.select: SELECT R.APPLICANT, R.RSV_PRICE FROM TB_RESERVATION R LEFT JOIN TB_CONFIRM C ON R.RSV_SEQ = C.RSV_SEQ WHERE R.ROOM_TYPE = 'M' AND C.BOSS_YN = 'Y'

SELECT R.RSV_SEQ , RU.APPL_YN , RU.USE_ID , E.EMP_NAME , E.EMAIL , T.TEAM_NAME FROM nkep_11.TB_RESERVATION R LEFT JOIN nkep_11.TB_RSV_DETAIL RU ON R.RSV_SEQ = RU.RSV_SEQ LEFT JOIN nkep_11.TB_EMPLOYEE E ON RU.USE_ID = E.EMP_ID LEFT JOIN nkep_11.TB_TEAM T ON E.TEAM_SEQ = T.TEAM_SEQ WHERE R.RSV_SEQ = #{rsvSeq}

SELECT R.RSV_SEQ , I.ITEM_NAME , IR.ITEM_CNT FROM nkep_11.TB_RESERVATION R LEFT JOIN nkep_11.TB_RSV_ITEM IR ON R.RSV_SEQ = IR.RSV_SEQ LEFT JOIN nkep_11.TB_ITEM I ON IR.ITEM_SEQ = I.ITEM_SEQ WHERE R.RSV_SEQ = #{rsvSeq}

SELECT R.RSV_SEQ , C.MGR_YN , IF(R.ROOM_TYPE = 'E', CONCAT(WE.WORK_NAME,'-',ED.EDU_NAME), CONCAT(WM.WORK_NAME,'-',MT.MT_NAME)) AS ROOM_NAME , R.RSV_PRICE , R.APPLICANT FROM nkep_11.TB_RESERVATION R LEFT JOIN nkep_11.TB_CONFIRM C ON R.RSV_SEQ = C.RSV_SEQ LEFT JOIN nkep_11.TB_MT_ROOM MT ON R.ROOM_SEQ = MT.MT_SEQ LEFT JOIN nkep_11.TB_EDU_ROOM ED ON R.ROOM_SEQ = ED.EDU_SEQ LEFT JOIN nkep_11.TB_WORKSPACE WM ON MT.WORK_SEQ = WM.WORK_SEQ LEFT JOIN nkep_11.TB_WORKSPACE WE ON ED.WORK_SEQ = WE.WORK_SEQ WHERE R.RSV_SEQ IN (SELECT R.RSV_SEQ FROM nkep_11.TB_RESERVATION R LEFT JOIN nkep_11.TB_RSV_DETAIL RU ON R.RSV_SEQ = RU.RSV_SEQ WHERE RU.USE_ID = #{empId})

SELECT R.RSV_SEQ , C.CON_SEQ , C.BOSS_YN , C.MGR_YN , IF(R.RSV_TYPE = 'L', DATE_FORMAT(R.RSV_DATE, '%Y/%m/%d'),DATE_FORMAT(R.RSV_DATE, '%Y/%m/%d %H:%i')) AS RSV_DATE , IF(R.RSV_TYPE = 'L', DATE_FORMAT(R.RSV_FDATE, '%Y/%m/%d'),DATE_FORMAT(R.RSV_FDATE, '%H:%i')) AS RSV_FDATE , IF(R.ROOM_TYPE = 'E', CONCAT(WE.WORK_NAME,'-',ED.EDU_NAME), CONCAT(WM.WORK_NAME,'-',MT.MT_NAME)) AS ROOM_NAME , R.RSV_PRICE , R.APPLICANT , C.REJECT FROM nkep_11.TB_RESERVATION R LEFT JOIN nkep_11.TB_CONFIRM C ON R.RSV_SEQ = C.RSV_SEQ LEFT JOIN nkep_11.TB_MT_ROOM MT ON R.ROOM_SEQ = MT.MT_SEQ LEFT JOIN nkep_11.TB_EDU_ROOM ED ON R.ROOM_SEQ = ED.EDU_SEQ LEFT JOIN nkep_11.TB_WORKSPACE WM ON MT.WORK_SEQ = WM.WORK_SEQ LEFT JOIN nkep_11.TB_WORKSPACE WE ON ED.WORK_SEQ = WE.WORK_SEQ WHERE R.RSV_SEQ = #{rsvSeq}

SELECT IF(R.RSV_TYPE = 'S', DATE_FORMAT(R.RSV_DATE, '%H%i'), '0900') AS RSV_DATE , IF(R.RSV_TYPE = 'S', DATE_FORMAT(R.RSV_FDATE, '%H%i'), '2230') AS RSV_FDATE , R.RSV_SEQ , R.WORK_SEQ , R.RSV_TYPE , IFNULL(C.BOSS_YN, 'NULL') AS BOSS_YN , IFNULL(C.MGR_YN, 'NULL') AS MGR_YN FROM nkep_11.TB_RESERVATION R LEFT JOIN nkep_11.TB_CONFIRM C ON R.RSV_SEQ = C.RSV_SEQ WHERE DATE_FORMAT(RSV_DATE, '%Y-%m-%d') <= #{selDate} AND DATE_FORMAT(RSV_FDATE, '%Y-%m-%d') >= #{selDate} AND ROOM_SEQ = #{roomSeq}

SELECT DATE_FORMAT(R.RSV_DATE, '%Y-%m-%d') AS RSV_DATE , DATE_FORMAT(R.RSV_FDATE, '%Y-%m-%d') AS RSV_FDATE , R.RSV_SEQ , R.WORK_SEQ , R.RSV_TYPE , IFNULL(C.BOSS_YN, 'NULL') AS BOSS_YN , IFNULL(C.MGR_YN, 'NULL') AS MGR_YN FROM nkep_11.TB_RESERVATION R LEFT JOIN nkep_11.TB_CONFIRM C ON R.RSV_SEQ = C.RSV_SEQ WHERE DATE_FORMAT(RSV_DATE, '%Y-%m') <= #{selDate} AND DATE_FORMAT(RSV_FDATE, '%Y-%m') >= #{selDate} AND ROOM_SEQ = #{roomSeq}

SELECT I.ITEM_NAME AS ITEM_NAME , I.ITEM_UNIT AS ITEM_UNIT , I.ITEM_TYPE AS ITEM_TYPE , I.ITEM_SEQ AS ITEM_SEQ FROM nkep_11.TB_STOCK S LEFT JOIN nkep_11.TB_ITEM I ON S.ITEM_SEQ = I.ITEM_SEQ WHERE S.WORK_SEQ = #{workSeq} AND S.ST_CNT > 0 AND I.ITEM_TYPE IS NOT NULL ORDER BY I.ITEM_TYPE
